headline.main: French Pen Up Nazis in Bastia Stronghold; Two American Rangers Die as Heroes

lead_paragraph: ALGIERS, Oct. 1 -- The battle of Corsica tended to become more and more a battle for Bastia today as the French troops, aided by a handful of American Rangers, continued their drive to pen the Nazis into the island's northeast corner.
abstract: 2 US Rangers killed in action against Ger tank and machine-gun carriers, road to Bastia; French troops aided by US Rangers continue drive to pin Gers at Bastia; Moroccan goumiers advance; Northwest African Air Force activity aids land fighting; Bastia raid illus
snippet: ALGIERS, Oct. 1 -- The battle of Corsica tended to become more and more a battle for Bastia today as the French troops, aided by a handful of American Rangers, continued their drive to pen the Nazis into the island's northeast corner....

byline.original: By Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
